input.sentences: my brother invited me and some friends to his newly bought house .
i cooked some ribs and burgers on the grill .
a few friends prepared the burger buns and all the condiments .
we sat around for a few hours and enjoyed a couple of beers .
my brother put on a organization film for us . we had a fun time watching finding nemo .

Then he photographed his friends as they ate.
